import React,{useContext} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Cart() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [cart] = state.userAPI.cart[0] if (cart.length === 0) return

Cart Empty

const cartProduct = cart[0] return ( <>
{ cart.map(product => {

{product.title}

#{product.product_id}
${product.price}

{product.description}

{product.content}

Sold: {product.sold}

Buy now
}) }
) }
